alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 3:02PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect northeastern Aroostook County... At 300 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers associated with the cold front was along a line extending from 19 miles north of Lille to 11 miles north of Dickey... and moving southeast AT 30 MPH. Locations impacted include... Fort Kent, Madawaska, Van Buren, Eagle Lake, Allagash, Deboullie Mountain, Frenchville, New Canada, Lille, Cross Lake, Dickey, Allagash Township, Madawaska Lake, Wallagrass, Grand Isle, Stockholm, Winterville, Sinclair, Soldier Pond and Saint Francis. This includes the following highways... US Highway 1 between Grand Isle and Fort Kent. State Highway 11 between Eagle Lake and Fort Kent. * Winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
